name: property-management-mern
description: MERN migration of real-cpanel-prov1 PHP property management system

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
